attributes.action: JUSTICE FOR MR KULWANT SINGH GREWAL
attributes.additional_details:
The body of Kulwant Singh Grewal, 76, from Southall, west London, was found in a village near the city of Ludhiana, northern India, on 30 May 2013.

Mr Grewal had gone to India to settle a property dispute in the Punjab courts and he was last seen alive on 16 May.

Kulwant Singh Grewal emigrated to the UK from Singapore in 1959.

Although he had lived and worked in London since then, he was not a British citizen but held a Singapore passport.

The Foreign and Commonwealth Office said it could not help as Mr Grewal was not a British national.

Please sign this petition so that Mr Grewal and his Family get Justice for this appalling and unjust murder which has shocked residents of west London.
